SELECT dc.amount,date_format(dc.pay_time,'%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s') as pay_time, wu.username,wu.nickname FROM darts_commission AS dc LEFT JOIN wt_user AS wu ON wu.uuid = dc.user_id LEFT JOIN darts_club_info AS dci ON dc.cno=dci.cno WHERE 1 = 1 and dci.isvalid=1
and dc.cno = #{cno}
and date_format(dc.pay_time,'%Y-%m')= #{pay_time}
AND wu.country like concat('%', #{country}, '%')
AND wu.province like concat('%', #{province}, '%')
AND wu.city like concat('%', #{city}, '%')
AND wu.areas like concat('%', #{areas}, '%')
ORDER BY dc.pay_time desc
SELECT sum(amount) num FROM darts_commission WHERE agno = #{agno} AND date_format(pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{dayTime}
SELECT sum(amount) num FROM darts_commission WHERE agno = #{agno} AND date_format(pay_time,'%Y-%m')= #{monthTime}
